KrishiGPTEnglish
Will it rain tomorrow morning in Nandurbar for my cotton spray?
Rain chance stays high until ~10am with moderate wind. Wait for a dry leaf surface; avoid spraying on wet foliage. Safer spray window looks like early tomorrow 6–8am. Recheck weather just before mixing. (Demo)
